title.am: በከተማ ውስጥ ለሚንቀሳቀሱ የጭነት ተሽከርካሪዎች መንቀሳቀሻ ፈቃድ መስጠት

om: Waliigaltee barreeffame abbaa fi dhaabbata gaafataa

en: Service fee: For private heavy vehicles under 10 days 1000 ETB, for 1 month 4000 ETB, for 3 months 10000 ETB, for 6 months 15000 ETB; For government heavy vehicles under 10 days 300 ETB, for 1 month 1000 ETB, for 3 months 2000 ETB, for 6 months 3000 ETB; For bread delivery vehicles engaged in work for 6 months 1000 ETB
am: የአገልግሎት ክፍያ ለግል ከባድ መኪና መንቀሳቀሻ ከ10 ቀን በታች 1000 ፣ ለ1 ወር 4000 ፣ ለ3 ወር 10000 ብር ፣ ለ6 ወር 15000 ብር) ፣ የመንግስት መኪና ከባድ ከአስር ቀን በታች የሚሰጥ 300 ፣ለአንድ ወር የሚሰጥ 1000 ፣ ለሶስት ወር የሚሰጥ 2000 ፣ ለ6ወር የሚሰጥ 3000 የሸገር ዳቦ የምገባ ስራ ላይ የተሰማሩ ተሽከርካሪዎች ለ6ወር 1000 ብር
om: Kaffaltii tajaajilaa: Konkolaata ulfaataa dhuunfaa guyyaa 10 gadi 1000 ETB, ji'a 1 4000 ETB, ji'a 3 10000 ETB, ji'a 6 15000 ETB; Konkolaata ulfaataa mootummaa guyyaa 10 gadi 300 ETB, ji'a 1 1000 ETB, ji'a 3 2000 ETB, ji'a 6 3000 ETB; Konkolaata daabboo geessuu hojii irra jiran ji'a 6 1000 ETB

description.om: To'annoo fi bulchiinsa daandii addaa geejjiba uummataa fi konkolaata yeroo balaa addaatiif

en: Use based on regulations and guidelines
om: Qophii maanuwalii itti fayyadamaa fi hojiirra oolchuu
Seera fi qajeelfama irratti hundaa'uun itti fayyadamuu

description.om: Tajaajila gaafii misoomaa bu'uura misoomaa hawaasaa fi dhaabbilee biroo qabachuuf

description.en: Service for handling traffic sign installation requests

description.om: Tajaajila gaafii dhaabbii mallattoo tiraafikii qabachuuf

description.en: Service for handling road paint marking requests
description.am: የመንገድ ቀለም ምልክት ጥያቄዎችን ለማስተናገድ አገልግሎት
description.om: Tajaajila gaafii mallattoo halluu daandii qabachuuf

description.en: Service for handling speed bump installation requests
description.am: የፍጥነት መገደቢያ ጉብታ መትከል ጥያቄዎችን ለማስተናገድ አገልግሎት
description.om: Tajaajila gaafii dhaabbii gufuu ittisuuf saffisaa qabachuuf

title.en: Preparing and Forwarding Vehicle Accident Victims Compensation Claims
title.am: የተሸከርካሪ አደጋ ተጎጅዎች የካሳ ክፍያ መጠየቂያ ማዘጋጀት እና ማስተላለፍ
title.om: Qopheessuu fi Dabarsuu Gaafii Beenyaa Miidhama Balaa Konkolaataa

description.en: Service for preparing and forwarding compensation claims for vehicle accident victims
description.am: ለተሽከርካሪ አደጋ ተጎጂዎች እና ቤተሰቦችቸው የካሳ ክፍያ ጥያቄዎችን ለማስተናገድ አገልግሎት
description.om: Tajaajila gaafii beenyaa miidhama balaa konkolaataa qopheessuu fi dabarsuu

title.en: Making Hit-and-Run Vehicle Accident Victims/Victim Families Complete Damage Compensation Claim Documents
title.am: ገጭቶ ባመለጠ ተሽከርካሪ አደጋ ተጎጂዎች/የተጎጂ ቤተሰቦች የጉዳት ካሳ ክፍያ መጠየቂያ ሰነዶችን እንዲያሟሉ ማድረግ
title.om: Godhuu Akka Miidhaman Balaa Konkolaata Baqatee Dhaqe/Maatiin Miidhame Waraqaalee Gaafii Beenyaa Miidhama Guutuu

description.en: Service to help hit-and-run accident victims and their families complete compensation claim documents
description.am: ገጭቶ ባመለጠ አደጋ ተጎጂዎች እና ቤተሰቦቻቸው የካሳ ክፍያ ሰነዶችን እንዲያሟሉ ለመርዳት አገልግሎት
description.om: Tajaajila miidhaman balaa baqatee dhaqeetii fi maatii isaanii waraqaalee gaafii beenyaa akka guutan gargaaruuf

en: For Physical Injury: Signed accident report form, Original police report, List of compensation claimants with ID copies, Original medical expenses and doctor's orders, Medical certificate for treatment period, Medical board evidence, Victim's age proof and ID copy, Victim's income proof, Other evidence and receipts

For Death: Signed accident report form, List of compensation claimants with ID copies, Original police report, Original medical expenses and doctor's evidence, Court decision on legal heirs, Autopsy evidence, Deceased's age proof and ID copy, Deceased's income proof, Other evidence and receipts

For Property Damage: Signed accident report form, Original police report, List of compensation claimants with ID copies, Original defense accident report, Original survey report, Property ownership proof (Libre), Other evidence and receipts
am: ለአካል ጉዳት፡ የአደጋ ማሳወቂያ ቅጽ (የተፈረመ)፣ የፖሊስ ሪፖርት/ ዋናው/፣ የካሳ ጤያቂው/ዎች ዝርዝር /ፋይዳ የመታወቂያ (ኮፒ)፣ የሕክምና ወጭና የሐኪም ትእዛዝ (ዋናው)፣ የሜዲካል ቦርድ ማስረጃ(ዋናው)፣ የተጎጂው እድሜ ማስረጃና መታወቂያ(ኮፒ)፣ የተጎጂው የገቢ መጠን ማስረጃ(ዋናው)፣ እና ሌሎች ማስረጃዎችና ደረሰኞች( ዋናው)

ለሞት፡የአደጋ ማሳወቂያ ቅጽ (የተፈረመ)፣ የካሳ ጤያቂው/ዎች ዝርዝር /ፋይዳ የመታወቂያ ወረቀት(ኮፒ)፣ የፖሊስ ሪፖርት(ዋናው)፣ የሕክምና ወጭና የሐኪም ትእዛዝና ማስረጃ (ዋናው)፣ የሕጋዊ ወራሾች የፍርድ ቤት ውሳኔ(ዋናው)፣ የአስክሬን ምርመራ ማስረጃ(ዋናው)፣ የማቹ እድሜ ማስረጃና መታወቂያ(ኮፒ)፣ የማቹ የገቢ መጠን ማስረጃ(ዋናው) እና ሌሎች ማስረጃዎችና ደረሰኞች( ዋናው)
ለንብረት ጉዳት፡ የአደጋ ማሳወቂያ ቅጽ (የተፈረመ)፤ የፖሊስ ሪፖርት /ዋናው/፤ የካሳ ጤያቂው/ዎች ዝርዝር /የፋይዳ መታወቂያ ወረቀት(ኮፒ)፤ የንብረቱ ባለቤት ማረጋገጫ ሊብሬ (ዋናው) እና ሌሎች ማስረጃዎችና ደረሰኞች( ዋናው)
om: Miidhama Qaamaa: Unka gabaasa balaa mallattaa'e, Gabaasa poolisii jalqabaa, Tarree gaafattoota beenyaa eenyummaa waliin, Baasii yaalaa fi ajaja hakiimaa jalqabaa, Ragaa hakiimaa yeroo yaalaa, Ragaa boordii yaalaa, Ragaa umurii fi eenyummaa miidhame, Ragaa galii miidhame, Ragaalee fi waraqaalee biroo

Du'aaf: Unka gabaasa balaa mallattaa'e, Tarree gaafattoota beenyaa eenyummaa waliin, Gabaasa poolisii jalqabaa, Baasii yaalaa fi ragaa hakiimaa, Murtii mana murtii dhaaltoota seeraa, Ragaa qorannoo reefuu, Ragaa umurii fi eenyummaa du'e, Ragaa galii du'e, Ragaalee fi waraqaalee biroo

Miidhama Qabeenya: Unka gabaasa balaa mallattaa'e, Gabaasa poolisii jalqabaa, Tarree gaafattoota beenyaa eenyummaa waliin, Gabaasa balaa eegumsaa jalqabaa, Gabaasa qorannoo jalqabaa, Ragaa abbummaa qabeenya (Libre), Ragaalee fi waraqaalee biroo

title.en: Forwarding Hit-and-Run Vehicle Accident Victims/Victim Families Damage Compensation Documents for Payment
title.am: ገጭቶ ባመለጠ ተሽከርካሪ አደጋ ተጎጂዎች/የተጎጂ ቤተሰቦች የጉዳት ካሳ ሰነዶችን ለክፍያ ማስተላለፍ
title.om: Dabarsuu Waraqaalee Beenyaa Miidhama Miidhaman Balaa Konkolaata Baqatee Dhaqe/Maatii Miidhame Kaffaltiidhaf

description.en: Service to forward completed compensation documents for hit-and-run accident victims to payment processing
description.am: ለገጭቶ ባመለጠ አደጋ ተጎጂዎች የተሟሉ የካሳ ሰነዶችን ለክፍያ ሂደት ለማስተላለፍ አገልግሎት
description.om: Tajaajila waraqaalee beenyaa guutaman miidhaman balaa baqatee dhaqeef gara adeemsa kaffaltii dabarsuu

en: Complete all required documents from clients
Create Excel summary if there are expenses
Submit to Road Safety and Insurance Fund Service
am: ከተገልጋይ የሚጠበቁ ሁሉንም አስፈላጊ ሰነዶችን ማሟላት
የወጣ ወጪ ካለ በኤክስኤል ማጠቃለያ መስራት
ለመንገድ ደህንነት እና መድን ፈንድ አገልግሎት አስፈርሞ መስጠት
om: Waraqaalee barbaachisoo hunda maamiltoota irraa guutuu
Yoo baasiin jiraate gabaabduu Excel tolchuu
Tajaajila Faandii Nageenyaa Daandii fi Inshuraansiitiif kennuu
